item.title: Lime Bike dumped in Mews Case number: CAS-1384971-K3D5K3, 16th June
item.description:
Reported Saturday Case number: CAS-1384971-K3D5K3 after the police had attended. Also reported to Lime twice. One bike gone other still in the mews. Kind request that someone from the Council chase up Lime as they are not taking any notice of me.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Alexander Mews, Bayswater, London
